data.name: TermsOfUseText
data.value: The {0} software is the property of the U.S. Government and for Government use. This includes all data, materials; data/databases, files, graphics, broadcasts, photographs, software, codes, equipment, CD ROMs, and other deliverables provided by the Government or developed under this contract. Materials shall remain the property of the Government. {0} software adheres to all export control regulations and ITAR compliance.
data.comment: The text corpus for the terms of use.

data.name: ViewTermsLabel
data.comment: Settings menu item for viewing terms of service

data.name: TabGroupsLabel
data.comment: Label for the navigation tab containing current learner's followed tags

data.name: GroupsTitle
data.comment: Title of page to change groups

data.name: EmptyGroupsTitle
data.value: There is no content from your groups yet
data.comment: Title text to display when all groups are empty

data.name: EmptyGroupMessage
data.value: You are not currently part of any groups.
data.comment: Body text to display when all groups are empty

data.name: MoreGroupsSubtitle
data.value: You might be interested in joining these groups
data.comment: Subtitle for the "More Groups" section

data.name: JoinedGroupsTitle
data.comment: Title for the user's groups

data.name: JoinableGroupsTitle
data.comment: Title for groups the user can join

data.name: GroupTopicsEmptyMessage
data.value: This group currently has no topics.
data.comment: Text to let the user know that the current group has no related topics.

data.name: GroupsErrorMessage
data.value: There was an error joining this group.
data.comment: Text to let the user know the group change has failed.

data.name: BookmarksEmptyMessage
data.comment: Default label for when the user doesn't have any bookmarks

data.name: TabBookmarksLabel
data.comment: Label for the navigation tab containing current learner's bookmarks

data.name: BookmarkErrorMessage
data.value: There was an error saving the change to this bookmark
data.comment: Text to let the user know the bookmark change has failed.

data.name: StatLabelBookmarked
data.comment: A verb to be used alongside something being bookmarked in a stat readout.

data.name: OnboardingPageOneTitleLabel
data.comment: Heading label for the landing page

data.name: OnboardingPageTwoTitleLabel
data.comment: Heading label for the landing page

data.name: OnboardingPageThreeTitleLabel
data.comment: Heading label for the landing page

data.name: OnboardingPageOneDescriptionLabel
data.value: We created {0} to help you find the information you need to get better at what you do!
data.comment: Description label for the landing page

data.name: OnboardingPageTwoDescriptionLabel
data.value: {0} helps you explore new topics, study the information that matters to you, and sharpen the knowledge you need each day.
data.comment: Description label for the landing page

data.name: OnboardingPageThreeDescriptionLabel
data.value: First, we need to create an account for you. With your account, we'll be able to find important and interesting content to help you learn quickly.
data.comment: Description label for the landing page
